sentences.sContent: The drawback of staying on the ship seemed to grow as I thought about how wrong it was to treat Captain Bligh in this way.
sentences.sCn: 留在船舶上的缺点似乎成长，我想到它是这样对待布莱船长错误。

sentences.sContent: In appointing Captain Bligh to rule the colony, the English Government spoiled an excellent seaman to make a very inefficient governor.
sentences.sCn: 英国政府将布赖任命为殖民地长官，使得他从一个优秀海员演变成一个极其无能的管理者。
